value.name: Persistent storage
value.description: Remember and restore Bluetooth headset mode status

value.name: Auto-switch to headset profile
value.description: Always show microphone for Bluetooth headsets, and switch to headset mode when recording

value.name: Restore profile
value.description: Remember and restore device profiles

value.name: Restore routes
value.description: Remember and restore device routes

value.name: Default sink volume
value.description: The default volume for audio sinks

value.name: Default source volume
value.description: The default volume for audio sources

value.name: Ducking level
value.description: The volume level to apply when ducking (= reducing volume for a higher priority stream to be audible) in the role-based linking policy

value.name: Allow moving streams
value.description: Streams may be moved by adding PipeWire metadata at runtime

value.name: Follow default target
value.description: Streams connected to the default device follow when default changes

value.name: Pause playback if output removed
value.description: Pause media players if their target sink is removed

value.name: Discovery timeout
value.description: The camera discovery timeout in milliseconds

value.name: No DSP
value.description: Do not convert audio to F32 format

value.name: Monitor ports
value.description: Enable monitor ports on audio nodes

value.name: Control ports
value.description: Enable control ports on audio nodes

value.name: Restore properties
value.description: Remember and restore properties of streams

value.name: Restore target
value.description: Remember and restore stream targets

value.name: Default playback volume
value.description: The default volume for playback nodes

value.name: Default capture volume
value.description: The default volume for capture nodes

value.name: Default media role
value.description: Default media.role to assign on streams that do not specify it

value.name: Forward format
value.description: Forward format on filter nodes or not

value.name: Restore default target
value.description: Remember and restore default audio/video input/output devices
